metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2824 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the trapper commandfunctionality of Zabbix Server 2.4.X. A specially crafted set of packetscan cause a command injection resulting in remote code execution. Anattacker can make requests from an active Zabbix Proxy to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
